title: AI video startup Moonvalley raised a fresh $43M, SEC filing shows
content: Los Angeles-based startup Moonvalley, which is developing AI tools for video creation, has raised a fresh $43 million in venture capital, according to an SEC filing. The filing, which lists 11 unnamed investors, comes roughly a week after Moonvalley launched its first AI video-generating model, Marey. Moonvalley previously raised $70 million in seed funding from backers […]
summary: AI video creation startup Moonvalley has secured $43 million in venture capital funding, following the launch of its first AI video-generating model, Marey. This comes after the Los Angeles-based company previously raised $70 million in seed funding.

title: UK’s demand for Apple backdoor should not be heard in secret, says court
content: A UK surveillance court said the backdoor order targeting Apple iCloud can be heard partly in public.
summary: A UK court has ruled that the surveillance order demanding a backdoor into Apple's iCloud can be partially discussed in a public hearing.

title: Krea raises $83M to be the one-stop shop for genAI creatives
content: Overwhelmed with trying to keep up with the different models you can now use to build your content using AI? A startup called Krea that’s looking to solve this problem specifically for designers and other visual creatives has now raised $83 million for a platform it believes will make the task of working with generative […]
summary: Krea, a startup aimed at helping designers and visual creatives manage AI-generated content, has raised $83 million in funding to develop its platform. The company believes its solution will simplify the process of working with generative AI models.

title: IBM acquires Hakkoda to continue its AI consultancy investment push
content: IBM on Monday said it has acquired Hakkoda, a data and AI consultancy based in New York. The acquisition would “further expand” IBM’s ability to bring consultants and AI to clients, particularly customers in industries like financial services, public sector, and healthcare and life sciences, said Mohamad Ali, SVP and head of IBM’s consulting business, […]
summary: IBM has acquired New York-based data and AI consultancy, Hakkoda, to enhance its consulting capabilities in AI for clients in sectors such as financial services, public sector, and healthcare and life sciences.

title: SignalFire raises over $1B as LPs embrace data-driven investing
content: Thirteen years ago, when Chris Farmer founded early-stage venture firm SignalFire with data analysis at the core of its investment strategy, many were skeptical about the approach — conventional wisdom dictated that nascent companies didn’t have enough data to make investment algorithms effective. “This was a very radical idea, and everyone thought I was crazy,” […]
summary: Venture firm SignalFire has raised over $1B, demonstrating the growing acceptance of data-driven investing strategies among limited partners. This marks a significant shift from 13 years ago when the firm's data-centric approach was met with skepticism.
